mapper.sql: ID, DOC_NAME, DOC_TYPE, PARENT_ID, HIERARCHY_ID, ROOT_ID, ITEM_SIZE, PROFILE_ID, VERSION_ID, PRIORITY, REFERENCE_NO, DESCRIPTION, STATUS, ALERT_STATUS, INHERIT_FLAG, CHECKOUT_ORG_ID, RECORD_STATUS, CREATOR_ID, UPDATER_ID, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_COUNT
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
from DMS_DOCUMENT
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into DMS_DOCUMENT (ID, DOC_NAME, DOC_TYPE, PARENT_ID, HIERARCHY_ID, ROOT_ID, ITEM_SIZE, PROFILE_ID, VERSION_ID, PRIORITY, REFERENCE_NO, DESCRIPTION, STATUS, ALERT_STATUS, INHERIT_FLAG, CHECKOUT_ORG_ID, RECORD_STATUS, CREATOR_ID, UPDATER_ID, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_COUNT) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{docName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{docType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{hierarchyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{rootId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{itemSize,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{profileId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{versionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{priority,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{referenceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{alertStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{inheritFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{checkoutOrgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{recordStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updaterId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateCount,jdbcType=INTEGER})
